data.title: Motoko Eio
data.content:
The Bank of Japan
Graduated from University of Tokyo
Used to be an economic adviser to the Bank of Japan
Participating in the formulation of monetary policy of Japan

data.title: Jason Fang
data.content: Founding Partner of Sora Ventures.Used to work for Fenbu-shi Capital and Juzhen Financials. Mentor at Alchemist Accelerator and Startupbootcamp in Silicon Valley

data.title: Jim De Wild
data.content:
McGill University
Famous venture capitalist and management educator
Used to manage and invest over $5 billion
Doctor of political science and tenured professor at McGill University

data.title: Anthony Diiorio CEO of JAXX
data.content:
Famous founder of the JAXX wallet and co-founder of Ethereum.
Senior cryptocurrency investor
Serial entrepreneur, VC, community organizer, and thought leader in the field of decentralized technologies

data.title: Alex Mashinsky
data.content:
CEO of Celsius
Early developer of VoIP protocol
One of the leading evangelists of web-based exchanges
Prominent entrepreneur who has founded several companies over the years, including GroundLink, Transit Wireless, Elematics and Arbinet

data.title: Hon. Ernie Eves
data.content: Founder and President of GIC group.Rich experience in investment and management.Has a very unique understanding and insight to the foreign exchange market, international trade and monetary policy

data.title: Guy Benartzi CEO of Bancor
data.content:
Founder of Bancor
Famous figure in blockchain industry
Has been active in the blockchain sector since 2012 and has helped introduce numerous local currencies, including Ithacash in New York and Heart Market in Tel Aviv

data.title: Patrick Dai
data.content:
Founder of Qtum
Dropout from the Chinese Academy of Sciences
Used to work for Alibaba Group
Rich experience in the development of blockchain technology and management and striving to push the blockchain technology to mainstream at an early date

data.title: Rich Robb
data.content:
Columbia University
Professor of Finance at Columbia University
PhD in Business Economics
Global head of the derivatives and securities subsidiaries of the Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank, Ltd.

data.title: James Pesando
data.content:
University of Toronto
Graduated from the Economics Department of Harvard
Famous macroeconomist working as research associate at National Bureau of Economic Research
Thorough research to monetary policy and Hayek theory
